Question.Subject: Passport needed for international boat cruise?
Question.Content: I am going on a private boat cruise with my friends from Florida. Will stay in the waters for few days. Will we need a passport?

ChosenAnswer: If you are unsure whether or not you need your passport then Faz will be able to help!

Answers.Answer: uh, where? just in the water?

depends where u are going.
If your in the USA and venture into Cuba then u need a passport
